summary: This module adds a command-line subcommand to the Diffusers CLI that automates downloading a model checkpoint, converting it to half‑precision (FP16), and optionally storing it in the safetensors format. It integrates with the existing CLI framework, handles argument parsing, version checks, and logging, and leverages Hugging Face utilities for model retrieval.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly prepare diffusion model checkpoints in an optimized FP16 safetensors representation, reducing memory usage and improving inference speed without manual conversion steps.
